function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Institutional quarantining overwhelmed system leading to more infections","Impact":"Increased infections and overwhelmed healthcare system","Mitigation":"Implement alternative quarantine measures such as voluntary home quarantine and telehealth concepts","Technologies":"Telehealth, virtual urgent care centers","People":"People in institutional quarantine","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"},{"Description":"Funerals conducted in homes leading to transmission of viruses","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement new guidelines for funerals to reduce crowding and transmission risk","Technologies":"Risk communication strategies, educational campaigns","People":"Communities and individuals conducting funerals at home","Owner":"Public health authorities, community leaders"},{"Description":"Timing of community mitigation measures impacting effectiveness","Impact":"Ineffective mitigation and delayed outbreak response","Mitigation":"Implement early community mitigation measures and travel restrictions","Technologies":"Early risk communication strategies, travel restrictions","People":"General population, healthcare providers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"}]}
